shortdesc.ph: Sets the properties of the extension provider.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setExtensionProviderProperty(String provider, String key, String value);
virtual int setExtensionProviderProperty( const char* provider, const char* key, const char* value) = 0;
public abstract int SetExtensionProviderProperty(string provider, string key, string value);
Future<void> setExtensionProviderProperty( {required String provider, required String key, required String value});

section.title: Details
section.p: You can call this method to set the attributes of the extension provider and initialize the relevant parameters according to the type of the provider.

note.p: Call this method after , and before enabling the audio (/) or the video (/).

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
